BH-020. Antique tri-fold expandable around a metal grommet
BH-020. Antique tri-fold expandable around a metal grommet

Vase shape when closed. Color painting of a winter scene among tall trees with a country house in the center, with lighted windows and smoke rising from the chimney. Woodruff Coal Co., Bridgeton, New Jersey. Printer: Banker's Advertising Co., Iowa City, Iowa. (Copy 1, identical to BH-021)
